Class Map

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.map.Map
public class Map extends Object
This class represent the map where the players move during the game, it is represented with an array so it's easier keeping track of the positions and with the dimension and startingPositions we can differentiate between the first flight mode and the regular one.

    • firstPlayerPlacement

      public boolean firstPlayerPlacement(Player player, Integer position)
      This method place for the first time a player on the board, If a player is already placed on the board it can't call this method.
      Parameters:
      player - This parameter represent witch player I want to place on the map
      position - This parameter represent in witch position I want to place the player
      Returns:
      Returns true if the placement of that player is valid

    • movePlayerForward

      public void movePlayerForward(Player player, Integer positions)
      This method represent the movement of a player on the map, For every movement the ranking position gets updated and if a player gets dubbed it will be eliminated
      Parameters:
      player - This parameter represent witch player I want to move
      positions - This parameter represent by how many positions i want to move the player

    • movePlayerBackward

      public void movePlayerBackward(Player player, Integer positions)
      This method represent the movement of a player on the map, For every movement the ranking position gets updated and if a player gets dubbed it will be eliminated (int this case is the moving player to get dubbed)
      Parameters:
      player - This parameter represent witch player I want to move
      positions - This parameter represent by how many positions i want to move the player

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(Player player)
      Removes a player from the map when they lose the game. Sets the player's lost flag to true, clears their map position, and updates the rankings.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to be removed from the map.
